Title: Belle's Magical World
Genre: Animation, Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Musical, Romance
Director: Bob Kline, Cullen Blaine, Dale Case, Daniel de la Vega, Barbara Dourmaskin-Case, Rick Leon, Burt Medall, Mitch Rochon
Writer: Richard Cray, Alice Brown, Carter Crocker, Nancy Greystone, Richard Cray, Chip Hand (story), Carter Crocker, Sheree Guitar
Actors: Jeff Bennett, Robby Benson, Paige O'Hara, Jim Cummings
Plot: Beauty and the Beast "midquel" set during Belle's original stay at the Beast's castle and composed of three short stories (four in the DVD release) that suitably teach both kids and adults to forgive, love, and be kind to one another.
